items.question: Explain 'to play devil's advocate'.
items.suggestedAnswer: To argue a contrary view for debate purposes.

items.question: Complete the sentence: 'His arguments were so ___ that nobody disagreed.'

Rewrite in direct speech: 'She said she had been waiting an hour.'
items.suggestedAnswer: 'I've been waiting an hour,' she said.

items.question: Correct the sentence: 'Each participant have to bring their equipment.'
items.suggestedAnswer: Each participant has to bring his/her equipment.
